Dm_GE_0005_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>It didn't sound like any noise the sand
shroud has made, that's for sure...
Dm_GE_0005_05: <sp:3:0:2:0701>You heard that too, right? It was...
Dm_GE_0005_07:
We've received word that a swarm of
Gibdos are attacking Kara Kara Bazaar!
Dm_GE_0005_08: Buliara is already on her way there!
Dm_GE_0005_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Angry_00>Link, we need to head to Kara Kara
Bazaar at once!

I must ask for your help once again.
My lightning and your guiding arrows
make us a formidable pair.
Do you remember Kara Kara Bazaar?
It's the oasis northeast of Gerudo Town.
Dm_GE_0005_02: I'm getting the hang of it now!
Dm_GE_0005_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Let's show those Gibdos what we're
made of!
Dm_GE_0005_12:
The Gibdos don't stand a chance against
this power!
Dm_GE_0005_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_00>I can't thank you enough for your
help, Link!
